value_prop.title: Fitness Made Simple, Personal, and Fun
value_prop.subtitle: At Bonobo Gym, we believe fitness should be a source of strength, joy, and community. Our unique approach focuses on movement, personalized attention, and making every session a rewarding experience - for both the individual and group.

values.title: Train Your Body as One
values.description: Our philosophy is simple: train the body, engage the mind. We combine strength, coordination, and mobility into unified workouts that build a functionally powerful body. This method enhances physical resilience while sharpening mental focus, creating strength from the inside out.

values.title: Tiny Groups, Huge Support
values.description: Our small group classes mean personalized coaching and a strong sense of belonging. Our trainers know you, your goals, and your limits, pushing you effectively and safely.

values.title: Find Joy in Every Session
values.description: We infuse fun and playfulness into challenging workouts. From engaging warm-ups to diverse exercises, we keep things fresh and stimulating, proving that hard work can also be incredibly enjoyable.

featured_classes.title: Our Main Classes
featured_classes.subtitle: Whether you're looking to build foundational strength, enhance your movement, or find specialized support, Bonobo Gym has a class designed for you.

classes.title: Strength & Conditioning
classes.description: Our core offering to build functional strength and endurance. Experience challenging workouts tailored to your level, ensuring steady progress and real results.

classes.title: Movement (MVMT)
classes.description: Unlock your body's full potential. Our unique movement classes blend elements from various disciplines to improve your flexibility, balance, and overall body awareness.

classes.title: Fitness for Every Age
classes.description: From our 'Funky Monkeys' (3-5 years) and 'Youth Class (10-14 years)' to our 'Plus Power' (65+), we offer safe, effective, and fun training for every stage of life.

final_cta.title: Take the first step
final_cta.subtitle: towards a stronger, more joyful you.

mark_story.title: Meet Mark
mark_story.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Mark Oogan, a 56-year-old Irishman who's called Sweden home for the past 20 years. My journey in fitness began early, as a semi-professional cyclist in Ireland for five years in my teenage years. I then delved deep into martial arts ‚Äì Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, Karate, and Boxing ‚Äì fueling a lifelong passion for sports. My vision for Bonobo Gym truly crystallized after training with Jon Hinds at Monkey Bar Gym in Darwin, Australia, where I became a certified natural trainer. This experience shaped my core belief: train the body as a single, integrated unit, focusing on natural strength, coordination, and mobility.
mark_story.paragraph2: At Bonobo, a big part of our philosophy is that training must be enjoyable. Sometimes that means fun warm-up games, but it always means keeping things stimulating, mentally and physically. While we incorporate standard strength training with weights, reps, and time intervals ‚Äì the essence of any good gym ‚Äì what truly sets us apart is our commitment to weaving coordination, rhythm, and mobility into every single workout. Every class includes a dynamic warm-up, often with playful games, a main workout, and a dedicated stretch after. This consistent format ensures a holistic and engaging experience for everyone.
mark_story.image_alt: Mark Oogan, founder of Bonobo Gym, smiling.

maja_story.title: Meet Maja
story: Movement and wellness have been central to my life for as long as I can remember.

I competed in skiing and rhythmic gymnastics throughout my youth, and after retiring from competition in my late teens, I naturally transitioned into teaching. I spent 10 years instructing aerobics and step aerobics before discovering Pilates, which I went on to teach for another decade.

After moving to Sweden six years ago, I discovered Soma Move, a practice that immediately resonated with me. I became certified and began teaching it alongside other modalities. Today at Bonobo, I lead the MVMT class‚Äîa blend of my favorite techniques and disciplines, rooted in one guiding principle: respecting and listening to our bodies.

My approach focuses on building strength, improving mobility, and preventing injury. We work with isometric holds, muscle fatigue (with adjustments), and a whole-body perspective. Equally important is knowing when to push and when to slow down. That awareness‚Äîlearning to tune into your body and move with intention‚Äîis at the heart of everything I teach.

Each class ends with a meditative cool-down, creating space to carry calm and presence into the rest of the day. I really like the approach focused on helping us to live a fit, injury-free life, grounded in self-awareness, and kindness (and some fun along the way:)
And absolutely love being part of Bonobo community

features.name: Joy in Movement & Unrivaled Community
features.description: Our trainers ‚Äì Mark, Maja, Christian, and all others ‚Äì share a universal enthusiasm for movement. We infuse playfulness into every session, believing that fitness should be fun, even when it's challenging. This creates a powerful sense of community. Our members consistently tell us how friendly and welcoming everyone is, making it easier to step through the door and feel right at home. We foster strong bonds, often gathering for social events outside of classes, like our famous Irish Coffee workout at Christmas!

features.name: All Levels Welcome, Always Adjustable
features.description: Whether you're a seasoned athlete or have never trained before, our classes are designed to be adaptable to your individual level, age, or any physical limitations. Our coaches provide hands-on guidance, ensuring you're challenged appropriately. You'll always be pushed to your maximum, safely and effectively.

features.name: Results-Driven & Integrated Coaching
features.description: Don't be fooled by the fun ‚Äì our workouts are hard work! We specialize in strength and conditioning, constantly nudging you to lift heavier, get stronger, and improve your overall fitness. The small group setting allows our trainers to provide personalized coaching, knowing your capabilities and helping you progress. This blend of community and individualized attention ensures you get the most out of every session, driving real, tangible results.

members.name: CarMa Training
members.bio: Specialized in pre- and post-natal training, CarMa Training collaborates with us to offer the 'Strong Mama' class, ensuring expert guidance for new mothers.

classes_hero.subtitle: Strength and movement for every body and age.

class_pillars.title: Our Classes
class_pillars.subtitle: Explore our classes designed to meet your unique needs and goals.

pillars.title: Strength & Conditioning
pillars.description: Build functional strength, endurance, and overall fitness in our foundational classes for adults.

pillars.title: Movement (MVMT)
pillars.description: Explore fluidity, balance, and body awareness through diverse movement practices for all adults.

pillars.title: Funky Monkeys (3-5)
pillars.description: Introduce your youngest ones to movement, coordination, and confidence in a fun, parent-inclusive setting.

pillars.title: Youth Class (10-14)
pillars.description: Empower pre-teens and teens to build strength, stability, and healthy habits for their developing bodies.

pillars.title: Plus Power (65+)
pillars.description: Enhance life quality with classes focused on strength, balance, and agility specifically for seniors.

pillars.title: Strong Mama
pillars.description: Safely regain strength and body control post-natal with expert guidance, and bring your baby along!

class_details.title: Strength & Conditioning
class_details.description: Our foundational Strength & Conditioning classes are designed to build a robust and resilient body. We combine functional strength work with challenging conditioning elements to improve your power, endurance, and overall fitness.
experience_list: Dynamic Warm-ups: Often including playful games to get your body and mind ready.
Varied Workouts: Utilizing weights, bodyweight, reps, and time intervals.
Integrated Approach: Focus on coordination, rhythm, and mobility in every session.
Dedicated Stretch: Each class concludes with a structured cool-down.
class_details.who_for_text: All fitness levels! Our coaches scale exercises to ensure you're challenged at your maximum, safely and effectively.

class_details.title: Movement (MVMT)
class_details.description: Our Movement class is an hour-long exploration of your body's capabilities, set to music. We draw inspiration from diverse disciplines like yoga, martial arts, dance, and Pilates to enhance your flexibility, balance, and body awareness.
experience_list: Continuous Flow: Fluid, dynamic sequences that challenge your stability and range of motion.
Body Awareness: Discover and strengthen areas you might overlook in traditional strength training.
Mind-Body Connection: Focus on control and precision in every movement.
class_details.who_for_text: Highly recommended for everyone, especially those seeking to improve flexibility or complement their strength training.

class_details.title: Strong Mama (CarMa Training)
class_details.description: Our 'Strong Mama' class is designed for new mothers, focusing on safely rebuilding core strength, improving posture, and increasing energy levels. This class is provided in collaboration with our external partner, CarMa Training, in a supportive environment where you can bring your baby along.
experience_list: Bring Your Baby: Babies are welcome and can be with you during the class.
Specialized Coaching: Controlled, process-driven training to help you safely regain core strength.
Intimate Setting: Small group sizes (max 10 moms) ensure personalized attention.
class_details.who_for_text: New mothers looking to return to training in a controlled and supportive environment.

class_details.title: Funky Monkeys (Ages 3-5)
class_details.description: Our 'Funky Monkeys' program introduces children aged 3-5 to the joy of movement in a fun, safe, and engaging environment. We focus on building fundamental motor skills, coordination, and confidence through playful exercises and games, all while a parent participates alongside them.

class_details.title: Youth Class (Ages 10-14)
class_details.description: The 'Youth Class' program is specifically designed for pre-teens and adolescents, focusing on building strength, stability, and proper movement patterns as their bodies grow and change.
class_details.who_for_text: Pre-teens and adolescents (e.g., 11-16) looking to build a strong, capable body.

class_details.title: Plus Power (65+)
class_details.description: Our 'Plus Power' class is tailored for individuals aged 65 and over, focusing on maintaining and improving the vital physical skills that enhance daily life quality.
class_details.who_for_text: Individuals aged 65 and above who want to stay active and maintain independence.

class_details.title: Specialized Workshops & Events
class_details.description: Throughout the year, Bonobo Gym hosts special workshops designed to deepen your technical skills and expand your knowledge on holistic health.
class_details.who_for_text: Members looking to refine specific techniques or gain broader health insights.

class_schedule.title: Our Weekly Class Schedule
class_schedule.subtitle: Find a time that works for you. All classes must be booked in advance.

booking_cta.title: Take the first step
booking_cta.subtitle: towards a stronger, more joyful you.

questions.question: What should I wear to a class?
questions.answer: Comfortable athletic wear and supportive indoor training shoes are recommended. For Movement classes, some prefer to train barefoot or in socks.

questions.question: Do I need to book in advance?
questions.answer: Yes, all classes must be booked in advance through our online system to ensure your spot, as our small group classes have limited capacity.

questions.question: What if I have an injury or physical limitation?
questions.answer: Please inform your coach before the class begins. Our experienced trainers are skilled at providing modifications and alternative exercises to ensure you can participate safely and effectively at your own level.

questions.question: How early should I arrive for my first class?
questions.answer: We recommend arriving 10-15 minutes before your first class to allow time for a quick registration, meet your coach, and get settled.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: Limited street parking is available directly outside the gym.

questions.question: What is the Bonobo Trail and what happens after it ends?
questions.answer: The Bonobo Trail is our introductory offer: 3 classes in 14 days for 360 kr. It's the perfect way to experience our gym. If you decide to join as a full member after your trial, you'll receive a 10% discount on your first month's membership!

questions.question: Can I bring a friend to train with me?
questions.answer: Our Gold and Gold+Coach members can bring a friend who is not currently a member to our monthly 'Friend Friday' event. Other passes do not include this perk.

questions.question: Can I freeze my membership?
questions.answer: Yes! Our Silver membership includes a 2-week freeze per year, and our Gold and Gold+Coach memberships include a 4-week freeze (split into two 2-week periods). Please contact us to arrange a freeze.

questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
questions.answer: Our monthly memberships can be canceled at any time with 30 days notice. Class packs, bootcamps, and annual memberships are non-refundable.

questions.question: Are there options for kids?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a Children and Youth Pass which is valid for our specific classes for younger members. Please check the class schedule for details or contact us for more information.

questions.question: What if I have never trained before?
questions.answer: No problem! Our classes are designed for all fitness levels. Our expert coaches will provide modifications to ensure you get a safe and effective workout.

header.title: Pick Your Path
header.subtitle: Choose a membership option or flexible pass that meet your needs

trail_offer.title: Bonobo Trail
trail_offer.description: Try us out! 3 classes in 14 days for only 360 kr.
trail_offer.promo: Convert to a full membership and get 10% off your first month!

gold.title: Gold
gold.annual_note: Or pay annually (12 089 kr) and get 1 month for free!

gold_coach.title: Gold+Coach
gold_coach.annual_note: Or pay annually (19 789 kr) and get 1 month for free!

passes.title: 10-Pack Clip Card
passes.description: Train when it suits you. The 10-pack clip card is valid for 6 months from the date of purchase. Perfect for those who want flexibility in their training schedule.

passes.title: Single Drop-in
passes.description: Perfect for trying out a class or for visitors. Book your spot in any of our regular classes. Great for those who want to experience our classes without a long-term commitment.

passes.title: Children & Youth Pass
passes.description: A 10-week pass for our Funky Monkeys or Youth classes, designed to build a foundation of fitness in a fun environment. Ideal for parents who want their kids to stay active and healthy.

passes.title: Single PT Class
passes.description: Get personalized attention and a workout tailored to your specific goals with a one-on-one session with our expert coaches. Suitable for those who want focused training and guidance.

passes.title: Strong Mama
passes.description: A 10-class program designed to help new mothers safely and effectively return to training after childbirth. Babies are welcome! Perfect for new moms who want to regain strength and confidence in a supportive environment.

passes.title: Bruce Member Add-on
passes.description: For our friends using Bruce! This add-on is for when you have used up your regular quota and want to join another class. Convenient for those who want to attend extra classes without upgrading their membership.

redirect_modal.title: Redirecting to Booking System
redirect_modal.description: You will now be redirected to our external booking and payment system to complete your purchase.

header.title: Get In Touch
header.subtitle: Have questions about our classes, memberships, or philosophy? Reach out!
